title: Revised confidence interval of dead standing trees

content.prompt: Which of the following statements about the revised interval based on the correct sample proportion is true?

choices.label: The revised interval is narrower than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is farther from 0.5 than the miscalculated proportion is.
The revised interval is narrower than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is closer to 0.5 than the miscalculated proportion is.
The revised interval is wider than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is farther from 0.5 than the miscalculated proportion is.
The revised interval is wider than the original interval because the correct sample proportion is closer to 0.5 than the miscalculated proportion is.
The revised interval has the same width as the original interval.

topic.text: 6.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
